description:
Salad turns downtime into downloads. Run Salad whenever you're away from the keys to score games, gift cards, subscriptions, DLC, and more at the Salad Storefront.


Update to version 1.9.5:
- Fixes an issue where Salad log files were growing beyond limits.
- Fixes issues where container workloads were sometimes not able to start.
Windows 10 and 11: Salad-1.9.5.exe
SHA-256: 914C2EBDACF1C025F19D2007867BF84EBC1D644FD77CF4F730D42F1CAB75AFA1
SHA-1: B48E0E21F09671635CC71CAFEDA34F046ACEA029
Errors? Warnings? Concerns? Questions? We understand. Read our blog post on anti-virus and cryptocurrency miners and check out our anti-virus configuration guides.
